name: Kas
culture_notes: mixed Coastal Tongues and Riveric Dialect speech
seafood-heavy cuisine with fermented fish sauces
constraints: no instant resurrection; ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
long-range mind influence rare and institutionally banned
navigation auguries supplement charts but do not replace seamanship
notes: near-medieval to early-industrial tech with pervasive localized ritual magic
small but strategic port linking riverine hinterland and island routes
